Package com.threecubed.auber.entities

Class Civilian

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threecubed.auber.entities.GameEntity
      • com.threecubed.auber.entities.Npc
        • com.threecubed.auber.entities.Civilian
  • public class Civilian
extends Npc
    The Civilian is the passive entity in auber that allows for Infiltrators to blend in. It will navigate from system to system performing tasks that won't actually have any impact on the game since its existence only serves to conceal infiltrators
    Since:
    1.0

        public void handleDestinationReached​(World world)
        Description copied from class: Npc
        Handle the event of the NPC reaching its current destination. For Infiltrators this might be to sabotage a system and for Civilians this might be to idle for a bit
